bibl.title: A Hoard of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins in Commerce, October 1992 (CH 8, 413).
bibl.note: Part 1 (S.M.H. and C.C.L.). Bronze Coins of Ptolemy IV and V. - Part 2 (C.C.L.). Currency Reform under Ptolemy IV and V. See in part. pp. 30-34: Papyrological Evidence and Historical Interpretation.
HUSTON Stephen M. and Catharine C. LORBER, A Hoard of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins in Commerce, October 1992 (CH 8, 413).
